com.percolate.caffeine

Class MiscUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.percolate.caffeine.MiscUtils

  • public class MiscUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for toys that do not have a home.

    Common uses:

    MiscUtils.dpToPx(this, 100); //Returns pixel equivalent of 100dp's (Density-independent pixels)
    MiscUtils.getVersionName(this); //"Your App name from manifest"
    MiscUtils.getVersionName(this); //"5.4.3" - your app version name from AndroidManifest"
    MiscUtils.getVersionCode(this); //307 - your app version number from AndroidManifest"
    MiscUtils.getApplicationName(this); /"Your App" - your app name from AndroidManifest"

      • dpToPx

        public static int dpToPx(android.content.Context context,
         int dp)
        dip to px conversion.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        dp - dips (Density-independent pixels) to convert to pixels.
        Returns:
        value of dp's in pixels for the current screen density.

      • getVersionName

        public static java.lang.String getVersionName(android.content.Context context)
        Get the "android:versionName" value from the Manifest file.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        Returns:
        the application version string, or "Unknown" if versionName cannot be found for the given context.

      • getVersionCode

        public static int getVersionCode(android.content.Context context)
        Get the "android:versionCode" value from the Manifest file.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        Returns:
        the application version code, or -999 if versionName cannot be found for the given context.

        Parameters:
        email - Address to check
        Returns:
        true if the email is a valid email address.
